website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for very small spaces with a nearby USB connection, such as a dorm room.
pros: USB plug convenient for connecting to a computer or wall plug (included)
Effective humidifier, despite its small size
cons: Vapor only spreads a short distance

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome for just over 30 days. Super bummed. I expected it to last much longer than that. UPDATE: this humidifier worked great for a little over 30 days. I contacted the seller, who verified what problems I was having- offered a couple solutions to fix the problem, when those didn't work I was sent a brand new unit- within 2 days of my correspondence- customer service is OUTSTANDING. My new unit is working great- upgrade to 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: LISAM

customer_reviews.title: Only cool, not warm mist as described.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little humidifier. It was packaged well, and is very simple to use. However, I purchased this for the advertised warm mist. It is named, Best Cool & Warm Mist. Disappointingly, there is no option for warm steam.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew V.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my allergies away!
customer_reviews.text: THis is exactly what I needed for my allergies. I have not been sneezing and having a runny nose since I started using this. As the instruction says, DO NOT use oils for aroma therapy with this device as it will ruin it. I tried it and was lucky it didn't stop working but the essential oils I used hardened wth the bottom plastic. It could have been worse. I've been using it a month and now breath normal with no congestion.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic humidifier - even more impressive customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier. I plugged it into my laptop at work and it keeps me hydrated. I used to suffer from dry eyes, but this is just what I needed. As good as the product is, I have to give a shout out to customer service who went above and beyond to help me order additional humidifiers.
customer_reviews.author: hfpsychologist

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hamster’s closet!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so crazy small I thought it was a joke. I bought it for my sons room, it is too small even for a little nursery. It doesn’t work in every outlet for some reason and it barely produces any vapor. Shipping took forever and it’s way over priced for the size. Some things you should just buy in stores. Don’t waste money on this pea sized disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Vannucci

customer_reviews.title: Quiet little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This little humidifier is perfect for my cubicle at work. I refill it twice a day (during a 9 hour shift). I should use distilled water but I have been using filtered water. It’s very quiet. I’ve o my had it for a week so I can’t attest to durability. I do empty it completely over the weekend and leave it open to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: ACE of Burke's

customer_reviews.title: Powerful cute little thing.
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier couldn't have come at a better time, i was off sick with nose troubles for the rest of the week and have had it on since day one, it's fantastic! Cats love it, too, haha! I was actually just talking to my mom and mom-in-law and promised them both this humidifier, so I'll be ordering two more this week! It's a great product and a fair price! Shortly after receiving humidifier in mail i got an email with additional instructions, as well as the info on how long do the filters last, and where i'd order a replacement. Amazing customer service!! This cute little thing is very powerful and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Alana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for personal use.
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT size on my bedside table. It gets dry in New Mexico, and this is just perfect to get me through the night. Recommend using distilled water. Tap water has calcium that will end up clogging it up and it or any other vaporizer will no longer work. Recommend getting the extra filters. The 2 that came with it, I got about 5 hours steam, which got me through most the night. When I replaced with new filters I got 7-8 hours.??? But I'must glad I got it even though a few gave bad reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Life saver in the winter!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my desk at the office. The great on full blast in the winter months really dries out my sinuses. This thing saved me this year! Super easy to set up and clean. The purple color is very pretty and the light feature is nice as well. Not to noisy and just the right amount of humidity! Works great in my 12x10 office. Not sure if it would work on anything bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Portia Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Within a week, it wouldn't turn on half the time when we pressed the button, and we had to fiddle with the cord a bunch to get it to turn on. And then, often, even though the light was on, there would be no vapor or very little vapor coming out, so it wasn't really working. This thing was so cute and I really wanted to love it, but we had to return it. Also, just FYI, I ordered the large size and paid a dollar extra for it, but I suspect the "small" and "large" are exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: nask

customer_reviews.title: Water tank will not last a full eight hours, but it works perfectly otherwise
customer_reviews.text: It’s reallh as described (size/colors/function) and it works well. Decent size. Easy to use. Quiet. My one issue is the water in the reservoir really only lasts an hour maybe two at most, so even though it has a setting to shut off automatically After eight hours, I still notice it struggling and trying to suck water up from an empty container. I do wish that the bottom part with a little larger and health enough water for a full eight hours
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... water and hard water is known to ruin things like these.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my fault for not thinking about this before hand but I have hard water and hard water is known to ruin things like these..I had mine for about one month before it would decide to randomly shut off or not expel steam when I did turn it on. It's hard to tell if it was a manufacture problem or it was the hard water...because I don't have HORRIBLE water, it is just slightly hard...Anyways, I tried to clean it out and start with filtered water again, but it was never the same. Next time, I think I'll invest in a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on a trip. I found it easy to pack and easy to use. I used it with an adapter plug (not included) for European countries, but you could also use it with a USB port. It comes with an adapter for use with US electrical outlets. It gives off a cool mist which is great for small spaces. You’ll need to wipe the mist that accumulates underneath it occasionally but that isn’t a problem. It has an optional nightlight setting. I like that it comes in several different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how wonderful this personal humidifier works. It last the eight hours as promised. The blue nightlight is perfect. It's smaller than I thought, but will make it packable for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Breathe Easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I used it every night since it arrived. I put 3 drops of eucalyptus oil, which naturally helps with decongestion as well as a natural sleep aid. My only complaint is you have to refill because it only last about 3 hours. So i placed it on my night stand along with a glass of water for a quick refill. It comes with one replacement filter stick, but i wish it came with more. It appears that because i use mine with the oil the filter becomes brown which makes the air a little stale. Therefore you will have to change the filter more frequently..
customer_reviews.author: urs131

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical!
customer_reviews.text: I love the practicality of this humidifier. It's so easy to open and close. It's also low maintenance and doesn't require much to operate. I haven't used an essential oil in it as the instructions advise against using any kind of oil. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ultimate-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This tiny thing works!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is silent, lights can turn off, mist starts right away, lasts a long time on one fill. Stopped my winter nose bleeds. It’s aesthetically pleasing, doesn’t take a lot of space. I really like it. I use regular tap water, but don’t fill to the top of the tank. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! 😊
customer_reviews.text: This product came a day early, and in great shape! 🙂 It was easy to set up! It looked great, and is just the perfect size for me. I'm surprised it came with an extra piece, too! I love how you can change the setting from the mist and light, just mist, or just light. ;) Overall, I am a very happy customer! Thank you so much! (*^▽^*)
customer_reviews.author: HanksCamperVan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a desk or small space
customer_reviews.text: I work in an open floor plan office. And I sit directly below the vents for AC and heat. So my skin/lips get very dry and my hair gets oily. I bought this to help with my immediate work environment. So far, the product itself seems great and other coworkers have purchased the product. I'm not sure if using it in such a large open space will allow it to deliver the best benefits, but I'm keeping my fingers crossed! It's really easy to assemble. I empty the water at night and leave it open to dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica G

customer_reviews.title: I like it .... wish was a bit bigger
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier came on time and as expected. Upon the first try, it did not work until I tightened the filter to the unit. Has been working fine since. I wish the water container was bigger as it does not last long. The device has an 8 hr automatic shut off but there is no way that there will be enough water to lasts that long. I just wished the water reservoir held more water so I don't have to fill it every day or twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: popierdulkaz

customer_reviews.title: subtle and quaint
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is great for a nook. Ibuse mine on my windowsil. Its great there because I got it specifically, for my plant . Helps to balance the quality of air in my room.. its also very quiet. And a perfect little sight light.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of you JZK smaller humidifiers and have been very happy with it, until now it just stopped working and I'm very unhappy about that. You purchased this item on June 6, 2017. Size: Small | Color: Blue | JZK Mini Portable Personal Cool Mist Air Humidifier. Please advise me what I should do? I don't feel I should have to purchase a new one since I bought it just over 1 year ago. Thank-You Nancy
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bajorek

customer_reviews.title: vant tell when on or off
customer_reviews.text: It is really confusing to know when its activated. it will not do anything for several minutes and sometimes pressing it on and off seems to get it to spring to life but not always. it can have the light on but not the humidifier, it can have the light off but the humidifier on. it can have the humidifier and light on. it is just not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Edwina D. Wall Howe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase! Helped my dry eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Got what I expected with great customer service, which was less expected! After three days my eyes seem to be a lot less dry which is perfect. My eyes get so dry that I have blink fits and get headaches and it has seemed to improve. No issues at all, works as expected easy to fill with water and small so it works for my small room. Remember it is SMALL so it runs out somewhat fast which isnt an issue for me but might be for others (Still runs for many hours though without refill).
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this humidifier constantly for over a year now in my college dorm room. I’ve had no problems with it! It is about the size of the softball and needs to be refilled every 6-8 hours. I’ve dropped it many times, but there are no cracks or scratches. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a humidifier for quite some time. This is perfect. It works. Its QUIET! It's perfect for the side of my nightstand next to where I sleep. It worked right out of the box and comes with and extra filter. I wish it came in a larger room size as well! I received this 2.20.16. Five days ago and there is already and improvement to my dried out sinuses. The owners were kind and sent follow up emails with fact sheets and instruction links. I will be purchasing another!
customer_reviews.author: Mermadedreams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this little device is great! Helps me sleep thru the night!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl G

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome portable humidifier!! Recommend! Plugs into USB port and AC adapter also included. Starts immediately upon being plugged in, absolutley silent, runs about 4 hours, just the right amount of mist to improve bone-dry air at work, the soft light is nice too, will keep it at work, coworkers liked it too, asked where I got it, took pictures of it so they could order one on Amazon too! I also ordered the Cotton Filter Wick Replacements as i expect to continue using this for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: SueBee

customer_reviews.title: It keeps my husband breathing easily all night long!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier for my husband. He travels all week through Arizona, New Mexico and NW Texas in his semi-truck. The air on his route is mostly quite dry, so along with whatever is blooming in each area along the way, his sinuses suffer. This nicely compact (3.9 x 3 x 3.9in) humidifier puts out a surprising amount of mist in his cab. It keeps him breathing easily all night long. The unit comes with a guarantee, too. What more can you ask for? We wouldn't choose another brand simply because the JZK humidifier does what it claims and for such a reasonable price! Thank you JZK for this great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great night stand humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I keep it by my nightstand while I sleep. It has helped with my dry skin on my face that I get every winter. I also like that the lighting is optional so I can turn it off when I'm going to sleep. I just with you could fill it without having to take it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: They have great customer service however I am on my third unit. The first two quit working but I was quickly given a refund by the company. I hope the third time is the charm because I like the product until it stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Roach

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a mini wonder! Simple set up, instantly humidity the minute you plug it in. It will turn off automatically and is silent. DO NOT use any scented oil in it....you will render it useless as per manufacturer's instructions. The blue glow night light is beautuful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ours Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the tiny humidifier for our tiny teardrop trailer - in the winter, the propane heat blows and is dry at night. This well designed, attractive little ball does an amazing job and is so easy to use. Thrilled with it. Hope it lasts years. That's the only drawback - seriously may not last - and for that I took a star.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Personal Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect personal humidifier with the ability to turn off the light, if desired, and can easily be moved from room to room. The quiet, peaceful sound does not disturb my sleep. I fill the bottom with filtered water & then turn it on before I go to sleep and the unit turns itself off when the water is gone. It is perfect on cold nights when the heater is on and completely drying the skin and sinuses. I've never had a humidifier before and I love this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: So far, it works well. Because it is a clear container, you can easily observe the water level. The reason I did not give 5 stars, I hope the device will be a little smaller and a little taller. It is not easy for my hand to open and close the top. :)
customer_reviews.author: 2Grapes

customer_reviews.title: Wish It Didn't Turn Itself Off so Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The humidifier is nice, pleasant looking, and the flow from it is great. My big complaint is that it shuts itself off after about an hour. I purchased one for work, which is fine because I can just simply turn it back on even though it is annoying, but I also purchased one for home for when I'm sleeping and it's pretty much useless because I'd have to wake up every hour to turn it back on. Should not be advertised for sleep if it doesn't at least run for 4-6 hours straight or have a feature to choose to put the timer on it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It puts out a good amount of moisture for such a little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: It puts out a good amount of moisture for such a little humidifier. It's easy to use and looks like it will be easy to clean as well. That's a major factor for me as I have used many other humidifiers that have been almost impossible to keep truly clean. I was specifically looking for a humidifier that is not ultrasonic which was the main reason I decided to try this one. I do wish it was larger - about twice as large would be perfect. The cord is quite short, it barely makes it from the wall to a nearby table. I had to add an extension cord. Overall, a great little humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 already. Incredible product for desk at work, next to the bed and in a small office.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: A little confusing at first, it wasn't putting anything out. But I think it just had to prime itself because it puts out a lot of vapor. Love this thing. And the little glow it puts off is great. Not too bright or too dim. I wish the reservoir were larger but I could just get a larger model. No biggie. It sits right on my night table and is so low profile. It's great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only a colorful nightlight for my girls' bedroom, in my room too! We love them! This humidifier is fairly dummy-proof! Love it and will be buying many more next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the humidifier because i work in an old building that caused me to cough "A LOT". I needed something simple and small for my desk. This was perfect. Sits right next to my computer, very quiet, easy to use and works with keeping the air fresh. I would recommend this for a small office area.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier is great! Easy to use/ set up and the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is great! Easy to use/ set up and the perfect size for my bedroom! It's not too bulky and is actually cute! I love the blue light - its very relaxing at night when I'm in my room with it on. JZK international is a wonderful business who took the time to email me individually and ask how I liked the product and to make sure I was satisfied. Great customer service and love the humidifier! Would definitely recommend for a first time user or for one room
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good personal humidifier for desk
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidifier for my desk at work! Doesn't leak or anything and easy to fill and clean. It comes with an extra filter, which I just put in. I haven't looked much yet, but hoping replacement filters aren't hard to find....
customer_reviews.author: Bethany B

customer_reviews.title: and nice, just not my thing
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the colored light sequence feature. The colors are bright, and nice, just not my thing. No problems with the functioning of the humidifier: it works great, lasts a full eight hours (when fully filled), and sends out a nice stream of moist air. Should probably have it sitting at or above head level though as the mist tends to stream downward shortly after leaving the unit. Initially the moist air shoots up about six inches or so. I use it nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Krager

customer_reviews.title: This is great, I use it all the time while I’m ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great, I use it all the time while I’m at my desk. It doesn’t make extreme noises and I love the lights that are an addition setting to blowing the air. Recommend for those with breathing issues and need something portable or not large.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Mini personal portable air humidifie: My rewiew
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida so the winter weather comes in spurts. When the heat goes on my nose becomes very dry thus the humidifier. I like it because it is small and the water lasts a long time for such a small amount. It's very easy to set up. Although I've not used it very much so far; because of our good hot weather. I also like the company that sells this product; They sent an email regarding my purchase before I received the humidifier; I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nena777

customer_reviews.title: Compact Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job intended. Very quiet with options of soft blue night light.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Harwell

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product I've Ever Purchased On Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these little units to keep my home, office, and car air moist during the winter months. Each unit only worked about 3 days and started malfunctioning. This product is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Humidifier for my desk at work, where it is very dry. It sends out a cool mist that helps you breathe easier and takes up very little room. The USB connection is very handy to plug into computer and not mess with an electric cord. My co-workers think it is cute and have asked me where I got it. It definitely makes a difference to keep my sinuses from drying out. For the price it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: chloe46774

customer_reviews.title: Great small
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a small humidifier for my bedroom for a while now, and I finally decided on this one after reading the reviews. So far it has lived up to everything I expected. It’s quiet, lasts all night, and it’s easy to use. The humidifier can be used as a nightlight or a humidifier or both, and I thought the price was super reasonable for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for work and one for home. I just love them. The do not take up any space. They work great and look very nice. I have gotten several complements on them. I would highly recommend this to people that would like humidity in the air while working in an office at home or at work. I am thinking about buying another one for my bedside.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best mini humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great humidifier. It is a nice size for you to place on your dresser without taking up too much space. At first I had trouble opening it, but after contacting the seller, I was able to open and close it easily. I like that it shuts off after three hours and that it is a nightlight. It does not cause spilling and it really helps the air in this cold weather when the heat is on. I plan to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Takkea

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it love the color the size the way it works the way it lights up it is soooooo silent like honestly if it wasn't for the light on it I wouldn't be able to tell it is on it is absolutely a wonderful product I strongly recommend it if you're looking to find something compact
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Really does a great job ! It's small and I use it at my office. It helps with the dry air. Looks super cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Kotek90

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I adore this little guy. It's much smaller than I expected, but the output is amazing. It has worked wonders to bring down the temperature in the rooms it's been in. Had a little trouble with getting one that stopped working after about a week, but after speaking with their customer service and going through some trouble shooting steps a new one is being sent out to me immediately. Even with the trouble I had I would recommend this product. The customer service is some of the best I've received through online ordering.
customer_reviews.author: EMiracle

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Works great, good price, and doesn't take up a lot of space. I am using it on my desk at work and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and is very quiet, but it stopped working after two weeks. I have tried placing and replacing the lid, screwing it on tighter and looser. The light comes on, but no mist is being produced.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mehrens Padbury

customer_reviews.title: Space
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have received so many compliments . 2 individuals asked where I ordered it from and one gets hers today. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Maisha Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great for office work spaces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for use at my work desk. It works great! I took it on a cruise ship recently and it was the perfect size for my stateroom. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: PNWLOVE

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Received my humidifier very quickly. It is the perfect size for my small bedroom. It's so quiet and puts out a good amount of steam. I would recommend purchasing one!
customer_reviews.author: redz4me

customer_reviews.title: Nice but no refills
customer_reviews.text: My nose was very dry at night so I decided to buy this. Works well, but I wish you could get refills for the filters. My suggestion is don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Brenda Essig

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It is quiet, it does it's job, and it is really cute. It is easy to clean and refill
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Love this I keep it at my desk at work ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this I keep it at my desk at work and I love the light mist it gives out. I feel less dryness in the air but of course only by me since it is small😊. My coworker just ordered three for her and two friends because she was impressed by it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is the first time in all of the years of purchasing products, particularly through Amazon, that I have had to return not only the original item purchased, but the replacement unit as well. The first unit works as advertised for about 2 weeks; the second unit never work properly. Specifically, there was not plume of steam produced. I will say that Amazon's return process was clear. I cannot recommend purchasing this item at all. Sometimes the price of a product is directly related to its quality!
customer_reviews.author: Marian

customer_reviews.title: Fill it, plug it in, and you're in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fill it, plug it in, and you're in business. I set it right on the arm of my recliner in the evening. Very handy. Planning to take it on an upcoming road trip and use it in the car and in hotels. Just hoping it continues to work this well for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased with this portable air humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this portable air humidifier! It works great & is very quiet. I bought it for my desk at work. It is exactly as described. I love how it has a usb adaptor & a plug in. I have recommended it to several people & will in the near future buy more for my home & truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amy E Wright

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool product! Easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool product! Easy to fill, night light is an added bonus. I absolutely love it and the company is great! Even sent me an email on how to use it (even though directions were in the box) and wanted to make sure I liked their product. This is great customer service and I was left very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the prettiest humidifier I've ever seen. Some can look like air fresheners but this one is something that will actually be admired by anyone that sees it in your house. I would highly recommend this product as well as buying anything from the seller, JZK International. Their customer service in unsurpassed.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Cute little guy! Works great, but do be aware that it doesn't hold much water. We use it at night and it does run out of water by morning, but still great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kropp

customer_reviews.title: great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: great things come in small packages! this is quiet and lasts about 4-5 hours. plus it's cute
customer_reviews.author: littlee

customer_reviews.title: Bought a bigger Crane cool mist humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Since ordering this, the cord has been loose and I have to keep plugging it in again or unscrewing and rescrewing the apparatus to get it to turn on and stay on. Mist is minimal and not helpful enough. Bought a bigger Crane cool mist humidifier, which is working well for bedroom & just ordered Gurin personal steam inhaler for the warm mist option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, but it will soak its surroundings.
customer_reviews.text: This little guy puts off a lot of steam. So much, in fact, that you might want to put a towel under it. Since I share a room with my baby, I didn’t want anything huge to take up space, so this was perfect. Plus, it doubles as a night light. Just be aware that this thing will soak things around it.
customer_reviews.author: Doniekels

customer_reviews.title: No e
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were bigger but I do love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Humidifer
customer_reviews.text: I love my Personal Portable Air humidifier. I was surprised at its small size but found it to be perfect on my table. I love the fact that it lights up as well as provides a pleasant cool mist.i. I would recommend it to anyone seeking a cool mist .
customer_reviews.author: puddles

customer_reviews.title: Small but MIghty & Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I ordered the larger one, but it arrived slightly cracked. Not a problem, I sent it back and thought I would try for the smaller one which just arrived 2 days ago! I LOVE IT!!! Supper Quite, Supper Cute, the Steam comes out Supper!!!
customer_reviews.author: MQT

customer_reviews.title: Well recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier! Has a strong mist for its size. Works very well. Will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got this little guy becuause I wanted something small and cute for my bed room, I place it right next to my bed and sadly I haven't gotten ride of my dry stuff noise at night yet but it's nice and I will keep trying, and yes I wake up a lot threw the night so I am able to keep filing it up! I may buy another one for my desk in my lab see if it helps me at work! I think it's a good thing but could improve.
customer_reviews.author: sfreeberg13

customer_reviews.title: Compact, soothing and effective!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty device that is compact and plugs into a USB port. It works well and the light is very soothing. My only complaint is the clumsy upper half of the humidifier. It's hard to remove and then reattach - I think the grooves in the plastic on both the top and bottom need to fit better. I'm not sure if the removal and reattachment of the two need to be twisted on or off or just pried apart. Maybe it's just a matter of getting used to it. I do like it a lot and will probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: JMGrant

customer_reviews.title: Adorable put proficient
customer_reviews.text: Small but does what it needs to. Moisturizes the air just enough to take out the dryness. Looks great with it's changing colors. Very Happy because I live in very cramped quarters and it fits right in
customer_reviews.author: Alice Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! 3 month old son had a upper respiratory infection and we bought this to put close to his bassinet. It works great and doubles as a little night light. We also send it to the sitters with him. It's easy to empty and refill and compact to throw in the diaper bag. Even the sitter wants to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Tarac

customer_reviews.title: This Bad Boy Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: JZK is one classy business practice. Wish I worked with an organization like JZK earlier in my career, because this Company gets it! Congrats on that! Now to the baby humidifier...2 words: This bad boy rocks! ( ok, 4 words ). My better half and I fell immediately in love with this baby. What a great practical solution for a couple who has just downsized by 2/3 to a place here space is at a premium! Really, really a super product! So glad I stumbled on it. We want two more...NOW !
customer_reviews.author: Mark D Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works great, very quiet, very cute. Love how it looks lit up with a very soothing feel to it. The soft blue light adds to the relaxing effect, that was a bonus! Bought it to help with my dry eye symptoms and use it on my desk at work. I noticed a difference within an hour, so it worked for me. Easy to use and clean, would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Love this cute thing
customer_reviews.text: Great little humidifier puts out more than my big vaporizer. Silent as can be too. The only complaint I can think of is that the pretty blue light is marred by the company logo. But I can handle that. Hope this runs for a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Stormlaughter

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can turn off the light and just ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute tiny little thing. I wanted something small to help my awful allergies and this did the trick! Love that I can turn off the light and just have the humidifier or just have the light or both. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Shay Diestel

customer_reviews.title: very annoying, especially at work
customer_reviews.text: I recently started suffering from allergies which cause a dry cough...very annoying, especially at work! After reading the reviews I ordered two humidifiers, one for home and one for the office. After one night using one on my bed side table I'm sold! This is a great product! I slept the entire night through without coughing!! I even kept the night light feature on and it's so soft that it didn't bother my husband or me. I just got in to the office and can't wait to see how much it helps me here!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After having many larger high maintenance humidifiers, this little bedside humidifier is so nice and easy to use and handle. It comes with an outlet plug which is what I need by my bed. Also....you can turn off the night light if desired. Very happy with this little humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I use this for just under two months during the work week. Now I hear a squealing noise and no moisture comes out of the humidifier.ko
customer_reviews.author: R Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Good, but seems used one.
customer_reviews.text: I like this item generally, which is easy to use and one-time full filled container with water lasts about 8 hours. One thing I feel strange is that there is water precipitate like stuff (tried clean but cannot clean up) on the top of this item where water comes out. I don't think a new item can have this situation, though it works well NOW.
customer_reviews.author: XUN

customer_reviews.title: Great Mini Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: received the product within two days and everything works as described. I love the portablity I can easily move it from room to room, its no bigger than a softball. The blue night light is soothing and the water refilling process is not a hassle. Only wish the power cord was longer. JZK international gave a nice touch with a personal note of thanks and word of caution not to use essential oils. I'm very happy with the product and service that has been provided.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerlily

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted when I purchased it! Filters are cheap to buy and easy to replace. I love the different settings for color or no color and I forget it there because it’s so quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby Hilbrich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep the air around me at work cleaned due to me being on the computer all day I need my eyes to remain moist. It's perfect and shipping of course was timely and packaged well
customer_reviews.author: Pea

customer_reviews.title: Great and small
customer_reviews.text: Small, quiet humidifier. The light is not too bright and can be turned off independently of humidifier. The water tank only holds about a half cup, so this is not a high-capacity humidifier by any stretch. Costed less than $20 for me - great quality for the price. This product cannot be used for smelly oils, which is fine by me. I have only had it for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as promised. Works well in my babies room. runs out of water rather quickly though but lasts through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great company with a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This company treats it's customers very well. I love the humidifier, it is compact, easy to use, shuts itself off, and I love it. My dog no longer zaps everything, and my sinuses are staying clear. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Leatherman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest product! I love it. I feel like I've been able to breathe at my desk finally. We've had a really bad allergy season and with the very dry office space, I was dying! Everyone that passes my desk always comments on it.
customer_reviews.author: mizzoutiger76

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Customer service is superb!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mini humidifier! It sprays just enough mist, and it doesn't leave any water residue. I don't use it for a night light only because I cannot sleep with any light on, but I am very satisfied with it. The size is absolutely perfect! And the price was great! Plus, who can beat a lifetime, hassle-free guarantee?! Thumbs up from me!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good small humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Stopped working after two years but it’s been a great help with my breathing. Downside is having to refill it frequently because it’s small.
customer_reviews.author: Ayana

customer_reviews.title: JKZ mini humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself, but have yet to use it- my teenage son is trying it first. He said he definitely can breathe better in the morning - he has bad allergies and sinus issues. The night lite was a little bright but he just used a washcloth to cover it. This also protected the furniture from the mist . I would recommend this to others and after I try it out , I'll probably have to get one for myself. (I can't give it the 5 stars since I haven't tried it yet)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not dissapoint
customer_reviews.text: This tiny humidifier is awesome. My master is pretty big and no more nose bleeds. It takes no room at all and it lasts a good 6-8 hrs. Its small and portable tgat i will be tsking it me to hawaii next month. The suppliers are awesome as well, i got an email reasuring me that the humidifier is covered "LIFETIME WARRANTY". If it breaks, if it doesnt meet your needs they'll send you a new one. I would recommend to everyone to give this little guy a try
customer_reviews.author: audalio soto

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my night stand and it has helped with keeping my nose moist. Just make sure you order the right size filters. Right size, beautiful colors and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen clark

product_meta.title: JZK Mini Portable Personal Cool Mist Air Humidifier with Night Light for Travel, Car, Baby, Desk, Throat, Nose 4 - 8 Hours
feature_bullets: Refreshes - Stream of cool or warm water mist freshens the air to ensure your ability to breathe comfortably!
Easy to Use - Versatile plug in choices with USB Cable & Adapter will provide you flexible charging options.
Flexibility - Humidifiers are the perfect for anyone with a baby, kids, new house or just to show them how much you care.
Lifetime Guarantee - If anything ever goes wrong with your humidifier, we'll take great care of you right away, eliminating all risk to you because you have nothing to lose!
A Typical Customer - “A Must Have...BEST Humidifier On Amazon!!” - Matt S. (Tehachapi, CA)
